metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0841 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android system (libutils). Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0. Android ID: A-37723026.

criterions.comment: android-platform-system-core package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:8.1.0+r3-5').
